Name: reflex epilepsy
Definition: A variable age at onset electroclinical syndrome that is consistently induced by identifiable and objective-specific triggers
Output: variable age at onset electroclinical syndrome

Name: obsolete aggravated epilepsy
Definition: A variable age at onset electroclinical syndrome that is consistently induced by identifiable and objective-specific triggers
Output: variable age at onset electroclinical syndrome

Name: progressive myoclonus epilepsy
Definition: A variable age at onset electroclinical syndrome characterised by a relentlessly progressive disease course until death.
Output: variable age at onset electroclinical syndrome
